alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:01AM CDT until April 05 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Randolph County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Lawrence County in eastern Arkansas... East central Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 401 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ravenden Springs, or 13 miles west of Pocahontas, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Imboden... Ravenden... Maynard... Ravenden Springs... Attica... Dalton... Elkins Park... Brakebill... Middlebrook... Warm Springs... Ingram... Eleven Point... Hamil... Stokes... Elm Store... Brockett... Pitman... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.
